headline: Florida Congressional Map Blocked on Racial Grounds
author: Arian Campo-Flores
sentences: I am finding that the enacted map is unconstitutionalbecause it diminishes African-Americans ability to elect the representative of their choice,? said Judge J. Layne Smith of the Second Judicial Circuit in Tallahassee during a video hearing on Wednesday.
Ron DeSantis because it broke up a plurality Black district in the northern part of the state.
A Florida judge blocked a congressional map approved by Republican Gov.
